project_info.project_name: 火锅店开业筹备-新中式风格

design_positioning.style_description: 融合传统中式元素与现代简约设计,体现文化传承与时尚品味

color_scheme.description: 遵循60-30-10色彩法则,米白色为主色调营造明亮舒适,胡桃木色增添文化底蕴,中国红点缀传统韵味

design_positioning.target_atmosphere: 温馨雅致、文化感十足、现代时尚

space_scenes.function: 顾客接待、品牌展示、第一印象塑造
space_scenes.design_notes: 强调品牌识别度,营造仪式感,体现新中式雅致风格
space_scenes.prompt: New Chinese style hotpot restaurant entrance with ceremonial atmosphere, beige walls (60%) with elegant walnut wood panels (30%), classical Chinese lattice screens with geometric patterns, warm yellow ambient lighting with Chinese red accent lights (10%), prominent brand logo wall with gold lettering, fresh green bamboo plants in ceramic pots, decorative Chinese calligraphy scrolls, modern reception desk with traditional elements, polished marble floor with wood accents, warm and inviting atmosphere, photographic quality, 8K ultra high definition, professional interior design rendering, 45-degree perspective angle, three-point perspective, strong sense of depth and space
space_scenes.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted, unrealistic, amateur, oversaturated, cartoon style, cluttered, messy, dark, gloomy, cold tones, modern minimalist, industrial style, western style

space_scenes.function: 顾客用餐、社交互动、核心营收空间
space_scenes.design_notes: 开阔通透,合理座位布局,兼顾私密性与氛围感
space_scenes.prompt: New Chinese style hotpot restaurant main dining hall, spacious and open layout with high ceiling, round hotpot tables (8-10 seats) with elegant walnut wood frames, Chinese lattice partitions for semi-private sections, warm yellow downlights with adjustable brightness, traditional Chinese landscape paintings on beige walls, decorative Chinese lanterns, modern ventilation system concealed in ceiling design, polished tile floor with carpet accents, comfortable upholstered chairs with wood details, green plants for air quality, warm and social atmosphere, photographic quality, 8K ultra high definition, interior design rendering, wide-angle view capturing full space, natural atmospheric lighting
space_scenes.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted, unrealistic, amateur, cramped, crowded, cluttered, dark corners, cold fluorescent lighting, plain boring design, no character, western style, modern minimalist

space_scenes.function: 私密用餐、商务宴请、高端客户服务
space_scenes.design_notes: 强调私密性与豪华感,提升客单价
space_scenes.prompt: New Chinese style VIP private dining room in hotpot restaurant, intimate and luxurious enclosed space, dark walnut wood wall panels with brass accents, exquisite Chinese calligraphy artwork in gold frames, soft indirect lighting from concealed LED strips, crystal chandelier with Chinese lantern design, large round hotpot table for 10-12 guests, premium leather chairs with wood armrests, traditional Chinese cabinet displaying tea sets, silk curtains with Chinese patterns, sound-absorbing ceiling with traditional coffered design, deep cultural atmosphere and sense of prestige, photographic quality, 8K ultra high definition, interior design rendering, intimate perspective showing luxury details, warm ambient lighting creating exclusive atmosphere
space_scenes.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted, unrealistic, amateur, cheap looking, too bright, cold tones, modern minimalist, western luxury style, gaudy, over-decorated

space_scenes.function: 顾客等候、提升体验、展示文化
space_scenes.design_notes: 缓解等待焦虑,提供舒适休息空间
space_scenes.prompt: New Chinese style waiting lounge area in hotpot restaurant, comfortable seating arrangement with traditional Chinese wooden benches with soft cushions, tea serving counter with traditional tea sets display, Chinese cultural elements including bamboo plants and calligraphy, warm beige walls with walnut wood accents, soft ambient lighting, information screen showing wait times, complimentary tea service area, decorative Chinese art pieces, cozy and welcoming atmosphere to reduce waiting anxiety, photographic quality, 8K ultra high definition, interior design rendering, welcoming perspective, relaxing warm lighting
space_scenes.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted, unrealistic, amateur, cramped, uncomfortable, cold atmosphere, clinical waiting room feel, boring plain design

space_scenes.design_notes: 清洁卫生是第一要务,兼顾设计美感
space_scenes.prompt: New Chinese style hotpot restaurant washroom lobby, clean and hygienic space with beige tiles and wood accents, modern fixtures with subtle Chinese design elements, large wall mirrors with decorative Chinese lattice frames, soft warm lighting with good brightness for makeup application, fresh green plants for air quality, elegant vanity area with premium hand soap dispensers, Chinese art prints on walls, spotlessly clean appearance, fresh and pleasant atmosphere, photographic quality, 8K ultra high definition, interior design rendering, clean aesthetic, well-lit and inviting, attention to hygiene details
space_scenes.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted, unrealistic, amateur, dirty, stained, cluttered, dark, dingy, cheap fixtures, hospital-like cold atmosphere, smelly, poorly maintained

space_scenes.function: 结账服务、商品展示、最后印象
space_scenes.design_notes: 高效结账流程,同时展示品牌周边商品
space_scenes.prompt: New Chinese style hotpot restaurant cashier and checkout area, elegant reception counter desk with walnut wood finish and beige stone top, Chinese decorative elements with red accent colors, modern POS system integrated seamlessly, product display shelves showing hotpot sauces and branded merchandise, warm lighting highlighting products, brand logo prominently displayed, organized and professional layout, clean and efficient design, welcoming staff area, photographic quality, 8K ultra high definition, interior design rendering, frontal professional view, bright and inviting atmosphere for positive final impression
space_scenes.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted, unrealistic, amateur, messy, cluttered, disorganized, unprofessional, cheap looking, dull lighting, boring plain design

output_config.base_dir: output/火锅店开业筹备/Z2-空间设计AIGC助手

quality_standards.style_consistency: must maintain New Chinese style across all scenes
quality_standards.detail_level: high detail in materials and textures
